name.jp: ホーリーバブルグローブ(男の子用)

description.en: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.ar: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.br: Nunca houve uma noite ou um problema que pudesse derrotar o nascer do sol ou a esperança.
description.cns: 从来没有一个夜晚或一个难题能让日出或希望消失。
description.de: Ein Paar Panzerstiefel mit dekorativen Flügeln.
description.fi: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.fil: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.fr: Il n'y a jamais eu de nuit ou de problème qui puisse vaincre le lever du soleil ou l'espoir.
description.id: Tidak pernah ada malam atau masalah yang bisa mengalahkan matahari terbit atau harapan.
description.it: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.jp: 日の出や希望を打ち負かすような夜に問題はありませんでした。
description.kr: 일출이나 희망을 이길 수있는 밤이나 문제는 없었습니다.
description.nl: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.pl: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.ru: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.sp: Nunca ha habido una noche o un problema que pudiera vencer el amanecer o la esperanza.
description.sw: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
description.th: ไม่เคยมีคืนหรือปัญหาใดที่สามารถเอาชนะพระอาทิตย์ขึ้นหรือความหวังได้
description.tw: 沒有一個夜晚可以擊敗日出或希望
description.vi: Không bao giờ có một đêm hay một vấn đề nào có thể đánh bại được bình minh hay hy vọng.
